meanings.definition: The act of traveling from place to place.
meanings.sent1: Her itinerancies took her to many different countries.
meanings.sent2: His itinerancies for work often involve long flights.
meanings.sent3: The cat's itinerancies around the neighborhood always make us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The itinerancies of the migrating birds amazed the observers.
meanings.sent5: The itinerancies of the circus performers were filled with excitement and adventure.

meanings.definition: The state of being an itinerant.
meanings.sent1: The itinerancies of the nomads were well-documented.
meanings.sent2: She embraced the itinerancies of a traveling artist.
meanings.sent3: The itinerancies of the wandering monk inspired many.
meanings.sent4: The itinerancies of the homeless man touched the hearts of the community.
meanings.sent5: The itinerancies of the explorer were legendary in the town.

meanings.definition: The practice of traveling regularly from place to place for work or leisure.
meanings.sent1: His itinerancies for business kept him away from home often.
meanings.sent2: Their itinerancies for vacation always led to new adventures.
meanings.sent3: The itinerancies of the salesperson were filled with interesting encounters.
meanings.sent4: The itinerancies of the travel blogger inspired many to explore.
meanings.sent5: The itinerancies of the retired couple were full of joy and discovery.
